text: The Late Show with Stephen Colbert is an American late-night talk show hosted by Stephen Colbert on CBS. It is the second version of the Late Show franchise, following the retirement of original Late Show host David Letterman. Jonathan Batiste is the bandleader.C The show premiered on September 8, 2015. Colbert had previously hosted The Colbert Report on Comedy Central. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website * Category:2015 American television series debuts Category:2010s American television series Category:American comedy television series Category:American television talk shows Category:CBS network shows Category:English-language television programs
title: The Late Show with Stephen Colbert
